errors.error_description: The README provides an incorrect command line example (`pymarkdown --lint ...`) for linting files, which does not exist.
correction_candidates: For more information on the Pymarkdown application and its command lines, such as `pymarkdown -l path/to/scan`, please [look here](https://pymarkdown.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
For more information on the Pymarkdown application and its command lines, such as `pymarkdown lint path/to/scan`, please [look here](https://pymarkdown.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
For more information on the Pymarkdown application and its command lines, please [look here](https://pymarkdown.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
For more information on the Pymarkdown application and its command lines, such as `pymarkdown scan --file path/to/scan`, please [look here](https://pymarkdown.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
errors.golden_answer: For more information on the Pymarkdown application and its command lines, please [look here](https://pymarkdown.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
